name: zip-robot-bridge
description: Bridge service for ZIP robot - translates WebSocket to ELEGOO-style JSON serial protocol

scripts.test:health: node -e "fetch('http://localhost:8766/health').then(r => r.json()).then(d => console.log(JSON.stringify(d, null, 2))).catch(e => console.error('Health check failed:', e.message))"
scripts.test:loopback: concurrently --kill-others -s first "LOOPBACK_MODE=true tsx src/index.ts" "sleep 2 && tsx scripts/test-integration.ts"
